claim_text: comparison.json records baseline_* and lambda_* metrics and the deltas delta_warn_LambdaT_steps, delta_mean_Ppump, and delta_mean_Qch.
improved_warn_time flag is derived from delta_warn_LambdaT_steps (positive means lambda reduced warn-time).
audit_bundle.json binds the comparison to git_commit and includes sha256 hashes for module, task input, and emitted outputs.
The comparator module YAML and its sample task define the comparison configuration and are part of the reproducibility chain.
comparison.md provides a human-readable summary table (warn/alarm steps, max/mean ΛT, pump/chiller proxies) consistent with comparison.json.
